title: Washita Battlefield National Historic Site: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety          While walking... Please stay on the designated trail. The trail is meant for foot traffic only.  No pets No bicycles No horses No motorized vehicles are allowed  All animals, plants, and artifacts are protected; please do not disturb,damage, or remove them from the park.         Remember... Carry water with you (this is especially important during the summer months)! Wear   Sunscreen A hat Insect repellent   Keep an Eye Out     Most snakes you see are not poisonous, but still watch for snakes Ticks Heat exhaustion/stroke  Overall, be aware of yourself, and your own capabilities!!           Trail at the Overlook NPS Photo
